Information

The application allows a quick check of public transportation monthly ticket/card validity in selected cities. To check ticket validity application uses methods exposed by public transportation companies.

The application is not officially cooperating with any public transportation company.

Supported public transportation companies

  • Krak√≥w, MPK

If you would like us to support validity check of monthly tickets in your city, check our forum and write to us.

Important

  1. The application does not guarantee 100% efficiency and/or correctness of the data. If public transportation company will change the way to check the validity of the ticket on their website, the application may stop working for a particular carrier.
  2. In case of doubt, you should always verify the information displayed in the application with a ticket purchase confirmation.
